title: Designing party invitations
content:
Hi all

My friend has asked me to design a flyer for her birthday party. She is 25 and having a big night out in a club.

Does anyone have any good examples of invitation design? Anything unique, inspirational or just great typography? Please post here.

Thanks.
author: newbie_chez

comments.content:
For some reason your post reminded me of this page:

[Hip Hop Party Flyers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192134/http:/strictlybreaks.com/party-flyers.htm)

I don't know that you'll gain any inspiration from it though.

Some nice traditional invites with hand lettering:

[http://www.nancyhowell.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192134/http:/www.nancyhowell.com/ "http://www.nancyhowell.com/")

[http://xyzink.com/invitations.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192134/http:/xyzink.com/invitations.html "http://xyzink.com/invitations.html")
